contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} [[Image:OHMap-doton-Elkton.png|right|Location of Elkton, Ohio]] '''Elkton''' is an [[unincorporated area|unincorporated place]] located in central [[Elkrun Township, Columbiana County, Ohio|Elkrun Township]], [[Columbiana County, Ohio|Columbiana County]], [[Ohio]], [[United States]]. It is located at [[latitude]] 40°45'43" north, [[longitude]] 80°41'56" west. The [[United States Postal Service]] has assigned Elkton the [[ZIP code]] 44415. (This is not to be confused with [[West Elkton, Ohio]], which is in an entirely different part of the state.) It lies along [[Ohio State Route 154|State Route 154]]. ==Notable institutions== Elkton is the location of a federal [[prison]], the [[Federal Correctional Institution, Elkton]]. {{Columbiana County, Ohio}} {{Coord|40|45|43|N|80|41|55|W|type:city_region:US-OH|display=title}} [[Category:Populated places in Columbiana County, Ohio]] [[Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio]] {{ColumbianaOH-geo-stub}}
